attributes.action: remove all UK public funding from the Climate Research Unit at the University of East Anglia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is clear from the emails and other documents revealed in the "CRU Hack" that the Climate Research Unit at the University of East Anglia is not acting impartially but is pursuing its own collective views. It has also, apparently, been considering make false responses under this Government's Freedom of Information Act. For these reasons it should no longer receive funding from the public purse.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
